snippet: Senator Marco Rubio sent out a statement welcoming former Gov. Jeb Bush, who will announce his candidacy on Monday, to the presidential race.
abstract: Senator Marco Rubio sent out a statement welcoming former Gov. Jeb Bush, who will announce his candidacy on Monday, to the presidential race.

headline.main: Verbatim: Marco Rubio Salutes His Florida ‘Friend’ Jeb Bush
